4ce2b68c-84f1-4296-b145-4e590ad7a19e.name: Floating findbar
4ce2b68c-84f1-4296-b145-4e590ad7a19e.description: Mod for Zen Browser that detaches findbar from edge of browser window so that it appears to float.
4ce2b68c-84f1-4296-b145-4e590ad7a19e.author: anaarkei

d8b79d4a-6cba-4495-9ff6-d6d30b0e94fe.name: Better Active Tab
d8b79d4a-6cba-4495-9ff6-d6d30b0e94fe.description: Adds a bright line next to the active tab to better highlight it.
d8b79d4a-6cba-4495-9ff6-d6d30b0e94fe.author: HliasOuzounis

2e3369c7-e450-46ba-8794-75ccb0de5e48.name: Now playing indicator
2e3369c7-e450-46ba-8794-75ccb0de5e48.description: Display an indicator on the 'Now playing' tab when the sidebar is collapsed.
2e3369c7-e450-46ba-8794-75ccb0de5e48.author: benstone326

bed8c922-616a-4165-8c86-6822ccf478ad.name: Erics Zen UI Tweak Box
bed8c922-616a-4165-8c86-6822ccf478ad.description: Various tweaks for the Zen Browser UI
bed8c922-616a-4165-8c86-6822ccf478ad.author: ericmackrodt

83a641f7-eca9-4c0f-91af-45627bef0539.name: Floating URLbar
83a641f7-eca9-4c0f-91af-45627bef0539.description: Levitate the URL bar when focusing on it, with a blurred background.
83a641f7-eca9-4c0f-91af-45627bef0539.author: mauro-balades

c8d9e6e6-e702-4e15-8972-3596e57cf398.name: Zen Back Forward
c8d9e6e6-e702-4e15-8972-3596e57cf398.description: Hide Back and Forward button when you don't need them
c8d9e6e6-e702-4e15-8972-3596e57cf398.author: KiKaraage

053a3ffa-9233-4554-88f3-076e6a6ebb43.name: Hide tab mute
053a3ffa-9233-4554-88f3-076e6a6ebb43.description: Hides the mute/unmute button when the sidebar is collapsed to make clicking on tabs easier.
053a3ffa-9233-4554-88f3-076e6a6ebb43.author: Tc-001

ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.name: SuperPins
ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.description: This Zen Mod enhances pinned tabs, by making some UI/UX changes.
ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.author: JLBlk

cb15abdb-0514-4e09-8ce5-722cf1f4a20f.name: Hide Extension Name
cb15abdb-0514-4e09-8ce5-722cf1f4a20f.description: Hides the name of the extension on tabs loaded from the extension
cb15abdb-0514-4e09-8ce5-722cf1f4a20f.author: ch4og

5ac61d13-a0dc-400e-aaa0-0f10fd3a7d0c.name: Uniform Workspaces Button
5ac61d13-a0dc-400e-aaa0-0f10fd3a7d0c.description: Make the workspaces button consistent with the other sidebar buttons, while remaining unique.
5ac61d13-a0dc-400e-aaa0-0f10fd3a7d0c.author: andrewbellucci

e4274cbc-c99b-411a-876d-9b943eb91282.name: Exit Button Right Padding
e4274cbc-c99b-411a-876d-9b943eb91282.description: A simple theme that adds a bit of padding to the right of the exit button
e4274cbc-c99b-411a-876d-9b943eb91282.author: ericmackrodt

39907934-59e9-4e42-89f0-a254d3c5e280.name: Sidebery
39907934-59e9-4e42-89f0-a254d3c5e280.description: Tweaks to support Sidebery as an alternative to Zen's native tabs and workspace implementation.
39907934-59e9-4e42-89f0-a254d3c5e280.author: Shaan

af7ee14f-e9d4-4806-8438-c59b02b77715.name: SuperGradient
af7ee14f-e9d4-4806-8438-c59b02b77715.description: This Zen Theme gives you great looking gradients with many options to customize it to your liking.
af7ee14f-e9d4-4806-8438-c59b02b77715.author: JLBlk
